title: Episode #23 - What's the History of the Crimson Wave?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
In this episode, Emma and Janina take a deep dive into the history of menstruation! 
What methods did people in the past use to cope during their periods? What cultural attitudes and taboos did historic societies have towards the subject of menstruation? Why do modern people tend to have heavier periods?

Featuring:
All manner of bizarre "feminine hygiene products" (designed by people who have not menstruated)
The Period Hut
Various belts and apparatuses!
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Emma and Janina take a deep diveâ€¦
